location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 8 to William Hornby, President and Governor, Council at Bombay, from Edward Galley at Bushire

physicalDescription.extent: Some text on the right-hand side of the page is missing.

mods.abstract: Reports latest political developments from Persia and states that trade between Bushire and Schiras [Shiraz] had been disrupted. The letter also reports that a sepoy from the Mercuryhad landed at Bushire to replace a member of the factory guard (who had killed himself after a dispute with a woman).
